ooze.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: if a thick liquid oozes from something or if something oozes a thick liquid, that liquid flows from it very slowly
ooze.translation[0].definitions[0].examp: A cut on his cheek was still oozing blood.
The ice cream was melting and oozing out of its wrapper.
ooze.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: to show a lot of a particular quality or feeling
ooze.translation[1].definitions[0].defin: very soft mud, especially at the bottom of a lake or sea
ooze.translation[1].definitions[1].defin: a very slow flow of liquid
